name: Nothing is Reel
description:
Short horror game based on the theme of movie reels.

Made by our team DEVELOPERS DEVELOPERS DEVELOPERS (Three Ds'):

Programming by Kyle and Shea.

Environment and textures by Avery.

Monster model and sound design by Lu.

Made for 2022 SNHU Game Jam, placed second and won best art. Made in 48 hours under the theme of Reel or Real.
